knimeNode.name: Spark Concatenate
knimeNode.shortDescription: Concatenates Spark RDDs row wise, inputs are optional.

fullDescription.intro: This node concatenates Spark RDDs, inputs are optional. The Spark RDDs need to have the same structure e.q. column names and types in the same order.

ports.inPort: Spark RDD contributing the rows of the first part of the output Spark RDD.

inPort.name: Optional second Spark RDD to concatenate
Optional third Spark RDD to concatenate
Optional fourth Spark RDD to concatenate

ports.outPort: Spark RDD with rows from all input Spark RDDs.
